resources.string: Start a new conversation or just enjoy your day!
Did you know: Pulse is way more than just a phone app. You can use Pulse to text from any device!
Set up private conversations from their settings menu!
Add a conversation to this folder for it to show up, here!
Archive a conversation for it to show up, here!

So do we and so will others! We\'re trying to get it in as many hands as we can to continue making it the best product that it can be and by inviting your friends to try, you\'re helping with this! \n\nSelect the friends below that you\'d like to send the app to and it will send them an SMS with a short description and a link to download!
I started using a new texting app and I think you\'ll like it! Plus it\'s free, so might as well download it: http://messenger.klinkerapps.com
Select or enter a contact to attach to the message!
The camera permission needs to be granted to take pictures!
You don\'t have any messages in this conversation yet, time to start it up!
Press the button to start recording audio!
Error running decryption! Please view this message on your phone.
Select the text you want to copy:
Would you like to schedule this message for later?
Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?
Are you sure you want to archive this conversation?
Are you sure you want to delete this template?
Do you want to edit or delete this template?
Use the + button to create a template
This is a private conversation and cannot be opened from the compose screen.
Google is now requiring any SMS apps to be set as the default messaging app, before they can access or send any messages. This permission is required.
The app can\'t work without those permissions! You need to accept them before we can continue.
Just working on getting your messages into the app. It won\'t take long!
More options for this conversation are stored in the navigation drawer.
Smooth, fluid layouts with a powerful design and seamless integration.
Message from your tablet, computer, watch, or any other connected devices.
Pin, mute, theme, and customize notifications for any contacts you are chatting with. Make Pulse yours.
Seamlessly integrates with any device (tablet, watch, TV, web, native Google Chrome, and Firefox apps) to support SMS and MMS from anywhere!
Insanely low pricing options to pay when you need it: $10.99 for life, $5.99 per year, $1.99 for 3 months, or $0.99 per month. Less than a cup of coffee.
Use the Android app, FREE (forever!) on your phone, or start texting from all your devices with a ONE WEEK free trial.
You will be redirected to the Play Store\'s subscription purchase system. You will not be charged until the end of the seven days and you can cancel any time from the Play Store page.
These settings will apply to any conversations where you have not created an individual Notification Channel for per-conversation customization.
Parsing media from previous text message…
Looking for auto replies on previous text message…
These options can be dangerous. Please see their descriptions on my help page, for usage instructions and notes.
Pulse is open source! Check it out on GitHub.
Access and send messages from any device!
This project is still in beta, please report issues that you might find!

Have a question? For a one-man crew, I do get a crazy amount of emails every day, which digs into the time I get to develop new features. To help me out, it would be great if you could search here quick to see if I have already addressed your question.
The help section is pretty extensive, but if you don\'t find your specific question, please do get in touch and I will be happy to get back to you!
Also serves as a feature roadmap
Keeps this conversation at the top of the list
Hide content on notifications and move this conversation to the Private Conversations section
One long, one short, one long vibration
Most carriers do not support this option. It is not RCS
Match Nav Bar to Base Theme
The light theme will use the white navigation bar, while the darker themes will use the black navigation bar
Remove the per-conversation themes, in favor of this global color set
Categorize conversations by date (Today, Yesterday, etc) instead of displaying a timestamp on each individual conversation
When disabled, you can simply tap any message to see the timestamp.
Apply Primary Color to App Bar
Whether or not the app bar should be colorized
%1$s\n\nAre you sure you want to add this blacklist? Messages will no longer be saved when they come from this number, and you will not be notified!
%1$s\n\nAre you sure you want to add this blacklist? Messages will no longer be saved when they contain this phrase, and you will not be notified!
%1$s\n\nDo you want to delete this blacklist?
You need to enter a phone number to blacklist!
You need to enter a phrase to blacklist!
You can add one with the plus button below!
View our privacy policy on the web
Sign up or log in to your account to start using more features like messaging from your tablet or computer
Removes the account from this device, your other signed in devices, and the server. This is not reversible!
Are you sure you want to delete your account and everything else with it? You can always sign up again later!
You have %s days left in the trial
Tap here to upgrade or cancel the trial!

You can upgrade your account to a subscription or lifetime membership to keep using Pulse across all your devices!\n\nNeed to cancel? Your account will be removed and you won\'t be charged. You can continue to use the app on your phone for free! Feel free to come back at any time.
Tap here to upgrade! You can cancel your subscription on the Play Store.
Missing messages? Use this to bring this device up to date with what is on your primary device.
This will clear your account, and refresh it with what is currently in your internal SMS database.
This will delete all messages from this device, and start with a clean copy of what is currently on your primary device. Are you sure this is what you want?
Immediately push any contact changes to the web.
Or, you can choose a single color that you want to base the theme on:
No apps found to handle this action
All the official places that you can access the app
Long messages will be sent as MMS instead of individual SMS
Customize the ringtone, vibration and more
These characters will be removed from outgoing messages
A max of three actions can be applied to a notification
Note that Smart Replies are currently only available in English
Where you want images and other MMS media to be saved
Issues with your account not syncing or not letting you log in? Use this option.
If you start this process, you must go through the whole thing. After it is done, you will need to log in again, on all your other devices. Do you wish to continue?
Notifications will display previous messages in the conversation
Notifications remain active after replying, allowing you to continue conversation in the notification
If messages aren\'t making it from your phone to the web, try disabling the battery optimizations for Pulse.
Do not set this higher than what your carrier allows
When disabled, group messages will be sent out as individual SMS, to each of the recipients
Automatically save any MMS media when it is received
Signatures will not be displayed in Pulse\'s message list, they will only be shown to the receiver of the message
This runs once per day to delete any messages older than your selected time period
This runs immediately to delete any messages, in this conversation, older than the selected time period
This gives you a chance to cancel and edit messages before they are sent
Always-active notification to give you the fastest access to composing a new message
These contacts will be made available on the notification actions
Setting a password will require you to enter it, before viewing private conversations
Turning this off will also disable link previews within message lists
Pulse will suggest relevant replies, when available. These are generated directly on the device, not a remote server
Pulse will suggest relevant replies, when available. These are generated directly on the device, not a remote server.\n\nIf you would rather not use this feature, it can be disabled from settings.
Smart replies will automatically send after a short delay
Worried about losing your messages? Pulse has you covered

Did you know: Pulse\'s online service is built around backing up your messages. When you sign up for a Pulse account, you can log in to that account on any device or tablet to restore all your messages, automatically!\n\nNo hassle and no messing around with manual backups. With Pulse, everything is smooth, easy, and completely automatic.

Looks like you already have a Pulse account, great! With your account, Pulse will automatically backup any messages you send and receive. When you are looking at the app on your other devices, you are actually just accessing this backup. To restore the messages to a new device, all you have to do is log in to your account.
Set up automated replies based on your situation
Driving mode and vacation reminders take precedence over all other replies. If either is turned on, no other auto replies will be sent
This will send the auto reply to all messages you receive
Which type of auto reply would you like to create?
Place conversations in to a folder to help organize and quickly navigate a busy inbox
No folders created - tap the top preference to create your first folder
That means that any developer can contribute code and features into the app.
This section of settings is just a place to store those community contributions. These features are not officially supported by Klinker Apps. They were coded and will be maintained by the community.
As such, they come with no guarantee that they will work the way you expect, will continue to be maintained, or even remain available. These features come with no support.
That said, they would not have been merged into the app if they did not work, solve a specific problem, or add to the app\'s functionality.
Smart replies will automatically send after a short delay
Are you sure you want to delete this scheduled message to %1$s?
You can create a new one with the plus button below!
Time must be in the future!
Do you want to delete this scheduled message?
Media, within a scheduled message, can only be viewed on the phone app.
Confirm fingerprint to continue. Touch sensor now.
Confirm Pulse account credentials to continue.
Private conversations can be password/fingerprint protected, so that only you can access them.\n\nIf you would like add this security, set up a passcode from the Advanced Features section.
Pulse can be used from any device connected to the internet - try it out today!
Pulse can be used on any of your devices!
With Android Oreo, these system-level settings allows you to customize notifications, for this conversation
Many global customizations are now only possible per-channel.

With Android Oreo, apps are forced to go through Notification Channels to customize the ringtone, vibration, LED, and all other notification options.\n\n You can customize these options with the button below and read more about this change, in the help section of Pulse.

With Android Oreo, some of the above options will redirect you to the system-level Notification Channels preferences for customization. To learn more about these channels, how they work, and why they must be used, please see Pulse\'s help page.
Hey, I am loving Pulse for texting! Give it a try: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=xyz.klinker.messenger
Top ratings go a long way
Top ratings are important to the app\'s growth! If you want to see the app continue to soar, please take a second to help me out.
Not ready to rate it? No problem. Hit your phone\'s back button and I will never ask again.
Consider giving it a rating or sharing it with your friends!\n\n Your 5 star reviews warm my heart :)

Looks like you cancelled your subscription. If you do not make a new subscription within that time, the app will automatically sign you out of your account in 2 days. If this is an error, please contact me via email.
Looks like you have gone through the free trial, already.
No subscription found, let\'s start your trial!
Your trial is expired and the purchase was cancelled. Your account will be deleted for now.\n\nFeel free to set it up again, whenever you want to use the multi-device functionality again!
Uh oh, Google Play might be having issues, they gave us a bad result.
Hmm… That purchase didn\'t match one on our record.
Subscription are billed after the seven day trial and can be changed/cancelled at any time
Can\'t go wrong with this one.
Just want to try? No problem.
Want to upgrade? Great! After you have made your selection on the next screen, you must go through the Play Store app and cancel your old trial or subscription. I cannot do this automatically.
Pulse is optimized for all your devices. Send texts from the web, a desktop computer, your tablet, a watch, and even your TV.
The first true iMessage competitor for Android.
No competition can touch Pulse\'s endless platform support paired with its low price. Messages sync between all your devices, instantly and seamlessly.

Give the online version a try, for seven days, then you decide how you want to support the app:

$10.99 for a lifetime membership
$5.99 per year
$1.99 every three months
$0.99 per month
Choose any of the three subscriptions, or select the lifetime membership to make a one-time purchase for the app.
Take 7 days FREE to find out for yourself why no one can touch our speed, pricing, or service.
Select any of the three subscription options to start your free trial. You can change or upgrade at any time.
Select one of the two subscriptions to start your free trial. You can upgrade at any time!
You will not be charged until the 7 day trial is finished. Cancel at any time.
Thanks for the upgrade! Please cancel the old subscription from the Play Store. Pulse cannot do this automatically.
%s days remaining in your trial. Click to upgrade!
This is the last day of your trial. Click to upgrade!
Your seven day trial is over. Click to upgrade!
You can continue using the app on your phone, for free!
